subject: Re: Fw: Wolf IQ | Annual Pro Plan for Westcoat website
preview: Hi Mikaela,  Thank you so much for confirming and I’m really glad to hear the issue’s resolved now!  If anything else comes up, please don’t hesitate to reach out, we’re always happy to assist

full_threads.body:
Hi Mikaela,

Thank you so much for confirming and I’m really glad to hear the issue’s resolved now!

If anything else comes up, please don’t hesitate to reach out, we’re always happy to assist.

Appreciate you reaching out!

Hi Allie,

Yes we received the test contact form and I have just lodged one myself.

It appears the issue is now rectified.

Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Kind Regards,

Mikaela Jenkins - Operations Manager

(08) 6499 9931

https://westcoat.com.au/



Roofing and Gutters Perth | Repairs & Restorations

Westcoat specialises in high-quality roofing and gutter repairs in Cockburn, WA. Trust our 25 years of experience for reliable service and guaranteed satisfaction

westcoat.com.au

Hi Mikaela,

Thanks for flagging this.

I’ve just submitted a test enquiry through the form, could you let me know if that came through on your end?

We’ve also reduced the JavaScript caching slightly, just in case that was causing the loading issue outside of WordPress. Hopefully this helps smooth things out for customers.

Let me know if you’re still seeing the same behavior or if it’s improved.

Happy to dig in further if needed!

Cheers,
Allie

Submitted a test, we've toned down the javascript caching just incase. Let us know if you have recieved the email?

(Time: 5mins)

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hey Mikaela,

Thanks for getting in touch.

Looping in @Wolf IQ Support who will investigate and get back you.

Thanks again,
Andy

On Wed, Jul 16, 2025 at 8:54 AM Westcoat Admin <admin@westcoat.com.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

We are still experiencing issues with the contact form on the webpage. From my testing it seems to work when utilising through WordPress however when not in development the loading bar is continuous resulting in customers thinking the form is not working and us receiving the same enquiry multiple times.

Can you please take a look for us?

Many Thanks,

Mikaela Jenkins - Operations Manager
(08) 6499 9931
https://westcoat.com.au/

Westcoat specialises in high-quality roofing and gutter repairs in Cockburn, WA. Trust our 25 years of experience for reliable service and guaranteed satisfaction
westcoat.com.au


From: Westcoat Admin <admin@westcoat.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 12:53 PM
To: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Wolf IQ | Annual Pro Plan for Westcoat website

Hi Andy,

The form seems to work when logged into WordPress however when not the same issue is still occurring. We are receiving the entries but the customer filling out the form cant tell if it has been submitted or not as it just appears to be loading. I just conducted a test from my computer and mobile phone and both have the same issue.

Thanks,

Mikaela Jenkins - Operations Manager
(08) 6499 9931
https://westcoat.com.au/

Cc: Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>; Accounts Team <accounts@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Wolf IQ | Annual Pro Plan for Westcoat website

Hi Mikaela,

Thank you for subscribing to a Yearly Plan.

I've attached the invoice below.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you for working with us!

Andy

Hi Mikaels.

Hope you're having a good week.

Two quick things:
  1. Would you be able to reply on the Mitchell Hancock thread confirming he is approved to update the DNS?
  2. For your subscription with Wolf IQ, would you like to pay monthly or annual (with a free month)?
Thanks,
Andy

No problems at all - happens more often than you can imagine.

We'll get in touch with Michael.

Mikaels Jenkins
